K10D0346_H0354:452b-0: @452b ;;rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /
K10D0346_H0354:452b-1: zhus chen gyi lo tstsha ba bande de ye shes
K10D0346_H0354:452b-2: sdes ba sgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa
K10D0346_H0354:453a-1: ma ga dh'a aa ba d'a na /
K10D0346_H0354:453a-3: ma ga dha bzang mo'i rtogs pa brjod pa /
K10D0346_H0354:453a-5: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0346_H0354:453a-6: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu
K10D0346_H0354:453a-7: rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun
K10D0346_H0354:453a-8: dga' ra ba na bzhugs te /
K10D0346_H0354:453a-9: de nas de'i tshe mnyan yod na /
K10D0346_H0354:453a-10: mgon med zas sbyin gyi bu mo ma ga dha
K10D0346_H0354:453a-11: bzang mo zhes bya ba dad pa dang ldan pa
K10D0346_H0354:453a-14: bdag dang gzhan la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa zhig gnas so //
K10D0346_H0354:453a-15: ji tsam na bu ram shing 'phel zhes bya ba'i grong khyer na tshong dpon gzhan zhig gnas la /
K10D0346_H0354:453a-16: de'i bu khyu mchog byin zhes bya'o //
K10D0346_H0354:453a-17: de yang gzhan mu stegs pa sten pas /
K10D0346_H0354:453a-18: gcer bu pa rnams la mngon par dad pa zhig gnas pa dang /
K10D0346_H0354:453a-19: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis cho 'phrul chen po rnam par bstan pa de'i tshe /
K10D0346_H0354:453a-20: mu stegs pa rnams mtha' 'khor tu kun tu gnas
K10D0346_H0354:453a-21: te; la la ni grong khyer bzang byed ces bya
K10D0346_H0354:453a-22: ba na'o // la la ni mud gi ri ka zhes bya ba'i yul na'o //
K10D0346_H0354:453a-23: la la ni bu ram shing 'phel zhes bya ba'i grong khyer na gnas so //
K10D0346_H0354:453a-25: khyu mchog byin de'i bar du khyim ma byas ba dang /
K10D0346_H0354:453a-26: de la gcer bu pa rnams kyis smras pa /
K10D0346_H0354:453a-27: mgon med zas sbyin gyi bu mo ma ga dha bzang mo zhes bya ba /
K10D0346_H0354:453b-3: skye bo dam pa rnams dang 'dra ba zhig yod do //
K10D0346_H0354:453b-4: ji srid des thos pa dang /
K10D0346_H0354:453b-5: bdag nyid gcer bu pa'i cha byad du byas te /
K10D0346_H0354:453b-7: ji tsam na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi khyim du slong ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang /
K10D0346_H0354:453b-8: des bu mo de mthong ngo //
K10D0346_H0354:453b-9: mthong ba'i mod kho na la bu mo de la kun tu chags par gyur la /
K10D0346_H0354:453b-10: de der bslangs pa'i phye zhva'i nang du blangs so //
K10D0346_H0354:453b-11: de nas bu mo des log par spyod pa de mthong ba dang /
K10D0346_H0354:453b-12: 'di ni shes bzhin med par slongs mo len to //
K10D0346_H0354:453b-14: de nas khyu mchog byin de ngo tsha bar gyur pa dang /
K10D0346_H0354:453b-15: bu ram shing 'phel gyi grong khyer du song ste pha la smras nas /
K10D0346_H0354:453b-16: des bu mo de bslangs so //
K10D0346_H0354:453b-17: mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa dang /
K10D0346_H0354:453b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0346_H0354:453b-19: gzhan du na gang gi tshe ma ga dha bzang
K10D0346_H0354:453b-20: mo 'di bu ram shing 'phel du song na rab
K10D0346_H0354:453b-21: tu byung ba rnams kyi bya ba dang /
K10D0346_H0354:453b-22: sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byed par 'gyur ro //
K10D0346_H0354:453b-23: yang ji srid cig na khyim bdag mgon med zas
K10D0346_H0354:453b-24: sbyin gyis nye du rnams la yang go bar byas
K10D0346_H0354:453b-26: bu ram shing 'phel du khyer ro //
K10D0346_H0354:453b-27: ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig gi tshe khyim de na gcer pu pa rnams zan za ba dang /
K10D0346_H0354:453b-28: de la sgyug mos smras pa /
K10D0346_H0354:453b-29: de ring bdag cag gi khyim na mchod gnas rnams bshos gsol gyi tshur shog /
K10D0346_H0354:453b-30: mchod gnas rnams la ltos shig /
K10D0346_H0354:454a-1: ga dha bzang mos de thos pa dang /
K10D0346_H0354:454a-5: yid bde ba skyes te bsams pa /
K10D0346_H0354:454a-6: nges par btsun pa sh'a ri'i bu'am /
K10D0346_H0354:454a-7: mo'u dag la gyi bu chen po la sogs pa
K10D0346_H0354:454a-8: nyan thos chen po rnams byon par gyur to snyam
K10D0346_H0354:454a-9: nas / de yid rab tu dga' ba dang /
K10D0346_H0354:454a-10: 'jigs pa med par song ba dang /
K10D0346_H0354:454a-11: gcer bu nags kyi ma he 'dra ba /
K10D0346_H0354:454a-13: phug ron gyi phru gu 'dra ba'i gcer bu pa rnams mthong ngo //
K10D0346_H0354:454a-15: de'i mod la ma ga dha bzang mo ngo tsha ste /
K10D0346_H0354:454a-16: de gdong gzhan du bltas pa dang /
K10D0346_H0354:454a-17: de la sgyug mo des smras pa /
K10D0346_H0354:454a-19: khyod ci'i phyir yi mug par gyur /
K10D0346_H0354:454a-21: gang 'di lta bu mchod gnas yin na mchod gnas
K10D0346_H0354:454a-22: ma yin pa go ji lta bu zhig yod par
K10D0346_H0354:454a-25: khyod la 'di bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa 'ga' zhig yod dam /
K10D0346_H0354:454a-27: bdag gi pha'i gtsug lag khang rgyal byed kyi tshal
K10D0346_H0354:454a-28: na sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i ston pa bzhugs te
K10D0346_H0354:454a-30: mi rgyu ba'i 'jig rten gyi mchod gnas yin no //
K10D0346_H0354:454a-31: khyod kyi ston pa de ci 'dra ba zhig /
K10D0346_H0354:454a-33: bdag gi ston pa btso ma'i tshogs ltar ser //
K10D0346_H0354:454a-34: btso ma gser ltar shin tu dri ma med //
K10D0346_H0354:454a-35: tshul khrims rnam dag shes rab shin tu dag /
K10D0346_H0354:454a-36: 'jig rten gsum na mnyam med 'gro las 'phags //
K10D0346_H0354:454b-0: @454b de thos ma thag tu sems rab tu dga' bar gyur nas smras pa /
K10D0346_H0354:454b-2: nged cag rnams la bcom ldan 'das de sang bstan par nus sam /
K10D0346_H0354:454b-3: ma ga dha bzang mos smras pa /
K10D0346_H0354:454b-4: bshos gtsang rnams sbyor cig dang /
K10D0346_H0354:454b-5: sang bcom ldan 'das spyan drang bar bya'o //
K10D0346_H0354:454b-6: ci tsam na de rnams kyis smras pa /
K10D0346_H0354:454b-7: bshos gtsang rnams sbyar gyi khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das sang spyan drongs shig /
K10D0346_H0354:454b-8: de nas ma ga dha bzang mos khang pa'i yang thog gi steng du mngon par 'dzegs nas /
K10D0346_H0354:454b-9: phyogs gang na bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa'i sa der thal mo sbyar te phyag byas nas /
K10D0346_H0354:454b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan rjes su dran te /
K10D0346_H0354:454b-11: me tog rnams 'thor zhing spos kyang btul nas /
K10D0346_H0354:454b-12: gser gyi bum pa'i chus bcom ldan 'das spyan drang ba'i phyir /
K10D0346_H0354:454b-13: gser gyi bum pa'i chu yang sbrengs so //
K10D0346_H0354:454b-14: snying rje ba'i tshig 'di skad ces kyang smras te /
K10D0346_H0354:454b-16: thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa /
K10D0346_H0354:454b-17: bdag ni ri dvags dang 'dra bar gyur cing mtha' 'khob na mchis te /
K10D0346_H0354:454b-18: dkon mchog gsum dang bral bar gyur pa la rjes su gzung bar mdzad cing /
K10D0346_H0354:454b-19: dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas par 'dir gshegs par mdzad du gsol /
K10D0346_H0354:454b-20: yang 'di skad ces kyang smras te /
K10D0346_H0354:454b-21: tshul khrims rnam dag shes rab shin tu dag /
K10D0346_H0354:454b-22: dad ldan snying po nyan thos che rnams kyis //
K10D0346_H0354:454b-23: mgon med gyur ba bdag la rjes bzung ba'i //
K10D0346_H0354:454b-24: don mdzad thugs rjes gshegs par mdzad du gsol //
K10D0346_H0354:455a-3: gser gyi bum pa'i chu 'ang nam mkha' la 'phags par gyur to //
K10D0346_H0354:455a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyang de'i tshe nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas /
K10D0346_H0354:455a-5: 'khor rnam pa bzhi la chos ston to //
K10D0346_H0354:455a-6: gser gyi bum pa'i chu de yang bcom ldan 'das
K10D0346_H0354:455a-7: kyi spyan sngar bee d'urya'i sdong bu bzhin du rnam
K10D0346_H0354:455a-8: par gnas so // me tog de bcom ldan 'das
K10D0346_H0354:455a-9: kyi steng gi nam mkha' la khang pa brtsegs pa
K10D0346_H0354:455a-12: spos kyang sprin brtsegs pa bzhin du gnas par gyur to //
K10D0346_H0354:455a-13: de nas de mthong ba dang /
K10D0346_H0354:455a-14: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos /
K10D0346_H0354:455a-16: bcom ldan 'das spyan 'dren pa 'di ga las mchis /
K10D0346_H0354:455a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0346_H0354:455a-19: dpag tshad brgya drug cu rtsa gsum na bu ram
K10D0346_H0354:455a-20: shing 'phel gyi grong khyer yod pa nas 'ongs so
K10D0346_H0354:455a-22: grong khyer de ni mu stegs pa rnams kyis bzung ba yin pas /
K10D0346_H0354:455a-23: rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pas 'gro bar bya'o zhes dge slong rnams la tshul shing brims shig /
K10D0346_H0354:455a-24: ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos
K10D0346_H0354:455a-25: rgan pa'i gnas mtha' nas bzung nas tshul shing brims
K10D0346_H0354:455a-26: te / 'di skad ces kyang smras so //
K10D0346_H0354:455a-27: sang bu ram shing 'phel gyi grong khyer du 'gro bar bya ste /
K10D0346_H0354:455a-28: grong khyer de ni mu stegs pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas /
K10D0346_H0354:455b-0: khyed @455b cag rnams las gang rdzu 'phrul thob pa des tshul shing long zhig /
K10D0346_H0354:455b-1: ji srid cig na rgan pa'i mtha' nas tshul shing len par brtsams so //
K10D0346_H0354:455b-2: yang de na p'u ra nu kun da au da
K10D0346_H0354:455b-3: pa da na zhes bya ba'i gnas brtan yod de
K10D0346_H0354:455b-4: / de yang rdzu 'phrul ma thob par lag pa brkyang ste /
K10D0346_H0354:455b-5: tshul shing len par brtsams pa dang /
K10D0346_H0354:455b-6: de la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa /
K10D0346_H0354:455b-7: gnas brtan mgon med zas sbyin gyi khyim du 'jug pa ma yin gyi /
K10D0346_H0354:455b-8: gzhan du na dpag tshad brgya drug cu rtsa gsum
K10D0346_H0354:455b-9: na bu ram shing 'phel zhes bya ba'i gnas yod
K10D0346_H0354:455b-12: ngas ni thog ma med pa'i dus nas goms pa'i nyon mongs ni spangs na /
K10D0346_H0354:455b-13: mu stegs pa rnams dang thun mong du gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul lta zhing /
K10D0346_H0354:455b-14: dka' ba ci zhig yod nas bskyed par mi bya
K10D0346_H0354:455b-15: snyam nas des kyang dus de nyid du rdzu 'phrul
K10D0346_H0354:455b-16: bskyed pa dang / ji srid du tshul shing gnyis
K10D0346_H0354:455b-17: pa ma brims pa de srid du des glang po
K10D0346_H0354:455b-18: che'i sna 'dra ba'i lag pa brkyang ste tshul shing
K10D0346_H0354:455b-19: bskyed pa dang / blangs so // ji tsam na
K10D0346_H0354:455b-20: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rgan pa'i mtha'
K10D0346_H0354:455b-23: gang gi rdzu 'phrul gang thob pa des bu ram
K10D0346_H0354:455b-24: shing 'phel zhes bya ba'i grong khyer du 'gro bar
K10D0346_H0354:455b-25: bya'o // de nas nyi ma gnyis pa la nam nangs te /
K10D0346_H0354:455b-26: dge slong rnams rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pas yang dag par chas so //
K10D0346_H0354:456a-0: de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi yang mnyan yod gang na ba der mngon @456a *//
K10D0346_H0354:456a-2: ci tsam na bar skabs der kun shes koondi n+ya zhes bya ba rta'i shing rta la zhon te /
K10D0346_H0354:456a-3: glog 'gyur ba'i snang ba ston cing dal bus char
K10D0346_H0354:456a-4: rab tu 'babs te; de lta bu'i rang gi rdzu
K10D0346_H0354:456a-6: de nas ma ga dha bzang mo'i bdag pos de mthong ba dang dris pa /
K10D0346_H0354:456a-8: 'di khyod kyi ston pa de yin nam /
K10D0346_H0354:456a-9: des smras pa; 'di ni kun shes koondi n+ya zhes bya ba yin te /
K10D0346_H0354:456a-10: 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi 'khor lo
K10D0346_H0354:456a-11: dang po bskor ba na 'dis thog mar bdag med
K10D0346_H0354:456a-12: pa mngon sum du byas pa de thog mar 'ongs
K10D0346_H0354:456a-14: bar skabs der gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos brag
K10D0346_H0354:456a-15: gi ri chen po shing sna tshogs pa rnam pa
K10D0346_H0354:456a-16: brgyas khyab pa / bya rnam pa sna tshogs kyis khyab pa /
K10D0346_H0354:456a-17: me tog sna tshogs yang dag par khebs pa /
K10D0346_H0354:456a-18: g-ya' chu sna tshogs kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa /
K10D0346_H0354:456a-20: steng gi nam mkha' las 'ong ngo //
K10D0346_H0354:456a-21: de nas khyim bdag des de mthong na smras pa /
K10D0346_H0354:456a-23: 'di khyod kyi ston pa de yin nam /
K10D0346_H0354:456a-25: 'di ni 'od srung chen po zhes bya ba yin te /
K10D0346_H0354:456a-26: bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyangs pa'i yon tan la gnas
K10D0346_H0354:456a-27: par smra ba rnams kyi mchog tu gsungs pa ste
K10D0346_H0354:456a-28: / 'dis gcig gis ma tshang ba'i glang dor stong bor zhing /
K10D0346_H0354:456a-29: ser skya bzang mo skye bo dge ba rnams dang mtshungs pa dang /
K10D0346_H0354:456b-0: gser @456b mang po mchil ma'i thal ba bzhin spangs nas mngon par byung ste /
K10D0346_H0354:456b-1: rab tu byung ba de ni 'ong ba 'di yin no //
K10D0346_H0354:456b-2: bar skabs der tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus seng ge'i shing rta mngon par sprul te /
K10D0346_H0354:456b-3: steng gi nam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis 'ong ngo //
K10D0346_H0354:456b-4: de nas khyim bdag des de mthong ba dang bris pa /
K10D0346_H0354:456b-6: gang seng ge'i shing rtas 'ong ba 'di khyod kyi ston pa de yin nam /
K10D0346_H0354:456b-8: 'di ni dge slong sh'a ri'i bu zhes bya ba yin te /
K10D0346_H0354:456b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa yin te /
K10D0346_H0354:456b-10: 'di ma'i mngal du zhugs pa tsam gyis /
K10D0346_H0354:456b-11: 'dzam bu gling thams cad kyi rtsod par smra ba rnams las rgyal bar gyur to //
K10D0346_H0354:456b-15: chos kyi 'khor lo rjes su skor ba de ni seng ge'i shing rtas 'ongs pa 'di yin no //
K10D0346_H0354:456b-16: de'i rjes thogs nyid la tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos /
K10D0346_H0354:456b-17: glang po ches srung 'dra ba'i glang po che'i rgyal por sprul te /
K10D0346_H0354:456b-18: steng gi nam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis 'ong ngo //
K10D0346_H0354:456b-19: de nas khyim bdag des de mthong nas /
K10D0346_H0354:456b-20: ma ga dha bzang mo la bris pa /
K10D0346_H0354:456b-21: gang glang po ches srung 'dra ba'i glang pos 'ong ba 'di khyod kyi ston pa de yin nam /
K10D0346_H0354:456b-23: 'di ni dge slong mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po zhes bya ba yin te /
K10D0346_H0354:456b-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa ste /
K10D0346_H0354:457a-1: lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rnam par rgyal ba'i
K10D0346_H0354:457a-2: khang bzang rkang pa'i mthe bos kun tu bsgul ba
K10D0346_H0354:457a-3: dang / 'dis klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /
K10D0346_H0354:457a-4: nye dga' bo gnyis btul ba de; glang po'i shing rtas 'ong ba 'di yin no //
K10D0346_H0354:457a-5: bar skabs der tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas
K10D0346_H0354:457a-6: shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam gyi padma thams cad gser
K10D0346_H0354:457a-7: las byas pa / bee d'urya'i sdong bu can /
K10D0346_H0354:457a-8: dngul gyi ge sar dang ldan par mngon par sprul te /
K10D0346_H0354:457a-9: rdzu 'phrul gyi nam mkha' las 'ong ngo //
K10D0346_H0354:457a-10: de nas khyim bdag des de mthong ba dang dris pa /
K10D0346_H0354:457a-12: 'di khyod kyi ston pa de yin nam /
K10D0346_H0354:457a-14: 'di ni dge slong ma 'gags pa zhes bya ba /
K10D0346_H0354:457a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i mig dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de /
K10D0346_H0354:457a-16: 'di ni bsod nams kyi stobs kyis yongs su bzung
K10D0346_H0354:457a-17: bas snod tshol bas gang ba lnga brgya sgo na
K10D0346_H0354:457a-18: gnas pa dang / cung zad bsams pa tsam gyis chos gos dang /
K10D0346_H0354:457a-22: yo byad rnams 'byung ba la spyod pa de padma'i shing rtas 'ongs pa yin no //
K10D0346_H0354:457a-23: bar skabs der tshe dang ldan pa gang pos nam mkha' lding gi shing rta mngon par sprul te /
K10D0346_H0354:457a-24: rdzu 'phrul gyis steng gi nam mkha' las 'ong ngo //
K10D0346_H0354:457a-25: de nas khyim bdag des dris pa /
K10D0346_H0354:457a-27: nam mkha' lding gi shing rtas 'ong ba 'di khyod kyi ston pa yin nam /
K10D0346_H0354:457b-0: @457b 'di ni dge slong gang po zhes bya ba /
K10D0346_H0354:457b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis chos ston pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa /
K10D0346_H0354:457b-2: de nam mkha' lding gi shing rtas 'ong ba 'di yin no //
K10D0346_H0354:457b-3: bar skabs der tshe dang ldan pa rta thul spyod lam rab tu zhi bas 'ong ngo //
K10D0346_H0354:457b-4: de nas khyim bdag des de la dris pa /
K10D0346_H0354:457b-6: gang lhung bzed lag na thogs te spyod lam rab
K10D0346_H0354:457b-7: tu zhi bas 'ong ba de khyod kyi ston pa
K10D0346_H0354:457b-8: yin nam / des de la smras pa; 'di ni dge slong rta thul zhes bya ba yin te /
K10D0346_H0354:457b-9: 'di'i spyod lam rab tu zhi bas glang po che smyon pa btul ba dang /
K10D0346_H0354:457b-10: 'di'i spyod lam rab tu zhi bas /
K10D0346_H0354:457b-11: 'phags pa sh'a ri'i bus bden pa mthong bar gyur te /
K10D0346_H0354:457b-12: de mngon par byung nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo //
K10D0346_H0354:457b-13: rab tu byung nas kyang dgra bcom pa nyid thob
K10D0346_H0354:457b-14: pa de spyod lam rab tu zhi bas 'ong ba
K10D0346_H0354:457b-15: 'di yin no // bar skabs der tshe dang ldan
K10D0346_H0354:457b-16: pa nye bar 'khor gyis gser gyi ta la'i nags
K10D0346_H0354:457b-18: rdzu 'phrul gyis steng gi nam mkha' la 'ong ngo //
K10D0346_H0354:457b-19: de nas khyim bdag des de la dris pa /
K10D0346_H0354:457b-20: ma ga dha bzang mo; gang gser gyi ta la'i
K10D0346_H0354:457b-21: nags la rten cing 'ong ba 'di khyod kyi ston
K10D0346_H0354:457b-24: 'di ni dge slong nye bar 'khor zhes bya ba /
K10D0346_H0354:457b-25: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu ston pa yin te /
K10D0346_H0354:457b-26: 'di la sh'akya lnga brgya tsam rab tu byung ba rnams kyis do shal dang /
K10D0346_H0354:457b-29: gser gyi gdugs la sogs pa'i rgyan rnams dang /
K10D0346_H0354:458a-0: @458a *// gos rnams kyi phung po chen po mdun du bzhag pa dang /
K10D0346_H0354:458a-1: 'dis de mthong ba dang skyo ba chen po skyes te /
K10D0346_H0354:458a-2: de dag thams cad mi rtag par shes nas /
K10D0346_H0354:458a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo //
K10D0346_H0354:458a-4: rab tu byung nas kyang dgra bcom pa nyid mngon
K10D0346_H0354:458a-5: sum du byas pa de gser gyi ta la'i nags
K10D0346_H0354:458a-6: la rten nas 'ong ba 'di yin no //
K10D0346_H0354:458a-7: de nas bar skabs der tshe dang ldan pa ka
K10D0346_H0354:458a-8: ta ya na'i bu chen pos bee d'urya'i khang pa
K10D0346_H0354:458a-9: brtsegs pa mngon par sprul te /
K10D0346_H0354:458a-10: rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' las 'ong ngo //
K10D0346_H0354:458a-11: de nas khyim bdag gis dris pa /
K10D0346_H0354:458a-13: bee d'urya'i khang pa brtsegs pa na 'dug ste 'ong ba 'di khyod kyi ston pa de yin nam /
K10D0346_H0354:458a-15: 'di ni dge slong ka ta ya na'i bu chen
K10D0346_H0354:458a-16: po zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde
K10D0346_H0354:458a-17: ba dang / bye brag du smra ba rnams kyi
K10D0346_H0354:458a-18: mchog tu bstan pa de bee d'urya'i khang pa brtsegs
K10D0346_H0354:458a-19: pa'i nang du 'dug nas 'ong ba 'di yin no
K10D0346_H0354:458a-20: ba dang / // bar skabs der tshe dang ldan
K10D0346_H0354:458a-21: pa gsus po ches khyu mchog gi shing rta mngon
K10D0346_H0354:458a-22: ba dang / // par sprul nas / rdzu 'phrul gyis steng gi nam mkha' las 'ong ngo //
K10D0346_H0354:458a-23: de nas khyim bdag des de la dris pa /
K10D0346_H0354:458a-25: khyu mchog gi shing rta la zhon te 'ong ba 'di khyod kyi ston pa yin nam /
K10D0346_H0354:458a-27: 'di ni dge slong gsus po che zhes bya ba
K10D0346_H0354:458a-28: bcom ldan 'das kyis rig pa thob pa rnams kyi
K10D0346_H0354:458a-29: mchog tu bstan pa yin te /
K10D0346_H0354:458b-0: khyu mchog gi shing rtas 'ong ba 'di yin @458b
K10D0346_H0354:458b-1: no; ;bar skabs der tshe dang ldan pa srung dbang
K10D0346_H0354:458b-2: gi bu ngang pa'i shing rtas steng gi nam mkha'
K10D0346_H0354:458b-4: de nas khyim bdag des dris pa /
K10D0346_H0354:458b-6: gang ngang pa'i shing rtas 'ong ba 'di khyod kyi ston pa yin nam /
K10D0346_H0354:458b-8: 'di ni dge slong srung dbang gi bu zhes bya
K10D0346_H0354:458b-9: ba bcom ldan 'das kyis snying rje la gnas pa
K10D0346_H0354:458b-10: rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de 'di yin te
K10D0346_H0354:458b-11: / 'di ni chu bo gangg'a brgal bar 'dod pa na bzang mo 'dug cig /
K10D0346_H0354:458b-13: tshig de'i rjes thogs nyid la ri bo rtsegs pa bzhin du gnas te /
K10D0346_H0354:458b-14: rnam pa thams cad du mi 'bab par byed pa
K10D0346_H0354:458b-15: de ngang pa'i shing rtas 'ong ba 'di yin no
K10D0346_H0354:458b-16: // bar skabs der tshe dang ldan pa rna ba
K10D0346_H0354:458b-17: bye ba nyi shu ri nags kyi tshogs la 'chag
K10D0346_H0354:458b-18: cing 'dug pa de 'chag bzhin du 'ong ngo //
K10D0346_H0354:458b-19: de nas khyim bdag des dris pa /
K10D0346_H0354:458b-21: gang nags shing brgya dag gis khyab pa'i nags 'di
K10D0346_H0354:458b-22: la 'chag cing 'ong ba 'di khyod kyi ston pa
K10D0346_H0354:458b-23: de yin nam / des de la smras pa /
K10D0346_H0354:458b-24: 'di ni dge slong rna ba can zhes bya ba /
K10D0346_H0354:458b-25: bcom ldan 'das kyis brtson 'grus rtsom pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa yin te /
K10D0346_H0354:458b-26: 'di skyes pa tsam gyis rna ba bye ba nyi shu ri ba dang bcas par skyes pa dang /
K10D0346_H0354:458b-27: gang gi rkang mthil gyi 'og nas sor bzhi tsam
K10D0346_H0354:458b-28: gyi gser gyi spu yang dag par skyes pa dang
K10D0346_H0354:458b-29: / gang 'di dang po'i zan la k'arsha pa na lnga brgya zad par byas pa dang /
K10D0346_H0354:458b-30: gang bcom ldan 'das snyung ba dang /
K10D0346_H0354:459a-0: mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos bshos gtsang nye bar blangs pa @459a *//
K10D0346_H0354:459a-2: gang gi dris 'od ma'i tshal thams cad kun tu gang ba dang /
K10D0346_H0354:459a-3: rgyal po gzugs can snying pos mnams nas /
K10D0346_H0354:459a-4: mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes te /
K10D0346_H0354:459a-5: gang gi rkang pa gnyis bzhag pa tsam gyis sa 'di rab tu g-yos pa dang /
K10D0346_H0354:459a-6: gang zhig rab tu byung nas 'chag pa na /
K10D0346_H0354:459a-7: de'i rkang pa gnyis las khrag byung ba zag pa
K10D0346_H0354:459a-8: khva rnams 'thung ba de 'chag cing 'ong ba 'di
K10D0346_H0354:459a-9: yin no // bar skabs der tshe dang dang ldan
K10D0346_H0354:459a-10: pa sgra gcan 'dzin 'khor los bsgyur ba'i cha lugs
K10D0346_H0354:459a-11: su mngon par sprul te 'ong ba dang /
K10D0346_H0354:459a-12: de nas khyim bdag des dris pa /
K10D0346_H0354:459a-14: gang 'di 'khor los bsgyur ba'i cha byad kyis 'ong ba 'di khyod kyi ston pa de yin nam /
K10D0346_H0354:459a-16: 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi sras bcom ldan 'das
K10D0346_H0354:459a-17: kyi bslab pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan
K10D0346_H0354:459a-18: pa yin te / 'dis yab kyi spangs pa'i dpal ston par byed cing /
K10D0346_H0354:459a-19: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i cha lugs kyis rin po che
K10D0346_H0354:459a-20: sna bdun dang ldan pa bu stong gis yongs su
K10D0346_H0354:459a-23: skar ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba'i zla ba lta bu dang /
K10D0346_H0354:459a-24: rgyal po'i lam bzung nas 'gro ba mi'i bdag po lta bu dang /
K10D0346_H0354:459a-25: chu bo stong phrag gi chu 'bab pas kun tu 'gengs pa'i rgya mtsho lta bu dang /
K10D0346_H0354:459a-28: mya ngan sel pa'i skye dgu skyong ba chen po lta bu dang /
K10D0346_H0354:459a-29: ri dvags kyi nang na seng ge lta bu dang /
K10D0346_H0354:459a-30: bya rnams kyi nang na nam mkha' lding lta bu dang /
K10D0346_H0354:459b-0: thams cad sel ba'i @459b nyi ma dang /
K10D0346_H0354:459b-1: gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los bsgyur ba dang /
K10D0346_H0354:459b-2: chos bzang na mig stong dang ldan pa chos skyong ba lta bur 'ong ba yin no //
K10D0346_H0354:459b-3: de bzhin du la la ni 'bar bar byed pa dang /
K10D0346_H0354:459b-4: la la ni char 'bebs pa dang /
K10D0346_H0354:459b-5: de bzhin du cho 'phrul sna tshogs pa ston cing 'ong ba yin no //
K10D0346_H0354:459b-6: la la sa las 'phags pa dang //
K10D0346_H0354:459b-7: la la nam mkha'i gzhi la gnas //
K10D0346_H0354:459b-8: la la stan ni sprul byed de //
K10D0346_H0354:459b-9: rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i mthu la ltos //
K10D0346_H0354:459b-10: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi slob ma rnams yang dag par song ba dang /
K10D0346_H0354:459b-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od gang gis 'dzam
K10D0346_H0354:459b-12: bu gling thams cad gser btse ma'i mdog 'dra ba'i
K10D0346_H0354:459b-13: 'od kyis gang ba de lta bu'i 'od bkye zhing
K10D0346_H0354:459b-15: bu ram shing 'phel gyi bar 'di 'od kyi dkyil 'khor chen po bkye bas /
K10D0346_H0354:459b-16: gang du yang mig gis mi mthong ba med pas thams cad kyis mthong bar gyur to //
K10D0346_H0354:459b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyang nam mkha' la gshegs pa dang /
K10D0346_H0354:459b-18: lag na rdo rje ni snam logs nas 'greng ngo //
K10D0346_H0354:459b-19: gnas gtsang ma pa rnams ni steng nas so //
K10D0346_H0354:459b-20: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams ni 'og nas so //
K10D0346_H0354:459b-21: g-yon logs nas ni brgya byin no //
K10D0346_H0354:459b-23: de bzhin du gtsug phud lnga pa dang /
K10D0346_H0354:459b-25: mig sbyin la sogs pa'i dri za rnams pi wang dang /
K10D0346_H0354:459b-28: rdza rnga la sogs pa rol mo'i bye brag snyan pa rnams brdung zhing me tog dang /
K10D0346_H0354:460a-0: phreng ba rnams kyang 'thor zhing 'byor pa chen pos gshegs @460a *//
K10D0346_H0354:460a-2: bar skabs der bcom ldan 'das kyis srog chags stong
K10D0346_H0354:460a-3: phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun bden pa la thog mar
K10D0346_H0354:460a-4: rab tu bkod pa mdzad nas /
K10D0346_H0354:460a-5: de'i 'og tu bu ram shing 'phel gyi grong khyer du gshegs te /
K10D0346_H0354:460a-6: grong khyer de na yang sgo bco brgyad yod pa dang /
K10D0346_H0354:460a-7: der bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas bco brgyad bco brgyad sprul par mdzad nas /
K10D0346_H0354:460a-8: sgo re re zhing sangs rgyas snang bar gyur pa nas /
K10D0346_H0354:460a-9: bcom ldan 'das ma ga dha bzang mo'i khyim du gshegs so //
K10D0346_H0354:460a-10: de nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po de rnams kyis
K10D0346_H0354:460a-11: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma mthong ste; de nas
K10D0346_H0354:460a-12: khros nas de'i khyim bshig par brtsams so //
K10D0346_H0354:460a-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grong khyer de thams
K10D0346_H0354:460a-14: cad shel gyi rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs te
K10D0346_H0354:460a-15: / gang khyim thams cad du yang sangs rgyas kyis ku bzhugs par mthong bar mdzad do //
K10D0346_H0354:460a-16: ji srid du bu ram shing 'phel du ma ga
K10D0346_H0354:460a-17: dha bzang mo la sogs pa'i srog chags brgya stong
K10D0346_H0354:460a-18: du ma rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la me tog
K10D0346_H0354:460a-21: spos rnams kyis mchod par byas so //
K10D0346_H0354:460a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang ma ga dha bzang mo
K10D0346_H0354:460a-23: la sogs pa'i skye bo'i tshogs chen po de rnams
K10D0346_H0354:460a-25: ma ga dha bzang mo la sogs pa'i srog chags
K10D0346_H0354:460a-26: brgya stong du ma rnams kyis bden pa mngon du
K10D0346_H0354:460a-27: mthong ba thob par gyur pa de lta bu'i chos
K10D0346_H0354:460b-0: @460b 'khor de thams cad kyang sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang /
K10D0346_H0354:460b-3: yang dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te /
K10D0346_H0354:460b-4: the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K10D0346_H0354:460b-6: ji srid du ma ga dh'a bzang mo mchis nas /
K10D0346_H0354:460b-7: srog chags brgya stong du ma mtho ris dang /
K10D0346_H0354:460b-8: thar pa la gzhol bar gyur pa dang /
K10D0346_H0354:460b-9: 'dis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyis pa ni ngo mtshar che'o //
K10D0346_H0354:460b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0346_H0354:460b-11: da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de /
K10D0346_H0354:460b-12: 'das pa'i dus na 'dis sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byas pa de nyon cig /
K10D0346_H0354:460b-14: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na /
K10D0346_H0354:460b-15: skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na /
K10D0346_H0354:460b-16: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas /
K10D0346_H0354:460b-22: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K10D0346_H0354:460b-24: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K10D0346_H0354:460b-25: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste /
K10D0346_H0354:460b-26: yang dus de'i de'i tshe grong khyer w'a ra na si na /
K10D0346_H0354:460b-27: rgyal po kram kr'i zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de /
K10D0346_H0354:460b-28: de'i bu mo gser gyi phreng ba dang ldan pa zhig btsas te /
K10D0346_H0354:460b-29: de'i ming yang gser phreng zhes bya bar btags so //
K10D0346_H0354:460b-30: ji srid cig na bu mo de cher skyes par gyur pa dang /
K10D0346_H0354:460b-31: na zla gzhon nu ma lnga brgya thams cad kyang
K10D0346_H0354:460b-32: gzhon nu mas bskor cing thabs gcig tu yang dag
K10D0346_H0354:460b-33: par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la bsnyen bkur
K10D0346_H0354:460b-34: byed de / de la dad pa /
K10D0346_H0354:461a-0: @461a *// yang dag par thob pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
K10D0346_H0354:461a-1: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung la ji srid
K10D0346_H0354:461a-6: yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byed do //
K10D0346_H0354:461a-7: yang dus de'i tshe rgyal po kri kr'is mtshan gcig la rmi lam bcu rmis te /
K10D0346_H0354:461a-9: glang po che'i rgyal po skar khung nas byung ba na mjug ma phra mo thogs pa dang /
K10D0346_H0354:461a-10: sgom pa'i phyi nas khron pa snyegs pa dang /
K10D0346_H0354:461a-12: mu tig bre gang tshong byed pa dang /
K10D0346_H0354:461a-14: shing rin mnyam par byed pa dang /
K10D0346_H0354:461a-15: kun dga' ra ba me tog dang /
K10D0346_H0354:461a-16: 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa ma byin par len pa rnams kyis phrogs pa dang /
K10D0346_H0354:461a-17: glang po phru gus spos kyi glang po 'jigs par byed pa dang /
K10D0346_H0354:461a-18: spre'u mi gtsang bas gos pas gzhan la skud pa dang /
K10D0346_H0354:461a-19: spre'u rgyal por dbang bskur bar mthong ba dang /
K10D0346_H0354:461a-20: ras gcig mi bco brgyad kyis drangs kyang ma ral ba dang /
K10D0346_H0354:461a-21: skye bo'i tshogs chen po gcig tu 'dus nas 'thab pa dang /
K10D0346_H0354:461a-24: 'tshang 'dru bar gyur pas 'jigs pa mthong ngo //
K10D0346_H0354:461a-25: de nas rgyal po de sad pa dang 'jigs shing skrag la /
K10D0346_H0354:461a-26: skyo bas nga'i srog gi 'tsho ba'i bar chad du 'gyur ba'am /
K10D0346_H0354:461a-27: rgyal srid las nyams par mi 'gyur ram snyam ste /
K10D0346_H0354:461b-0: des bram ze rmi ltas kyi mtshan ma ston @461b
K10D0346_H0354:461b-1: shes pa rnams bsdus nas de rnams la rmi lam
K10D0346_H0354:461b-3: de rnams kyang gser phreng can la zhe sdang ba yin pas /
K10D0346_H0354:461b-6: khyod la thams cad kyi nang na thugs su byon pa de'i snying dang /
K10D0346_H0354:461b-7: me la sbyin sreg gi mchod sbyin mdzod cig /
K10D0346_H0354:461b-8: de nas rgyal po de yi mug pas bsams pa /
K10D0346_H0354:461b-9: thams cad kyi nang nang la sdug pa ni nga'i gser phreng can yin no //
K10D0346_H0354:461b-10: gser phreng can gyis de thos pa dang /
K10D0346_H0354:461b-11: de yang mkhas pa yin pas /
K10D0346_H0354:461b-12: rgyal po de'i gan du song ste /
K10D0346_H0354:461b-14: lha nyi ma shar na mar me'i 'od dgos pa ci mchis /
K10D0346_H0354:461b-15: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
K10D0346_H0354:461b-16: 'od srung 'di drang srong smra ba ri dvags rgyu
K10D0346_H0354:461b-18: der gshegs la zhus shig dang /
K10D0346_H0354:461b-19: bcom ldan 'das des khyed la lung ji ltar bsnyan pa de bzhin du khyed kyis gzung zhig dang /
K10D0346_H0354:461b-20: de nas rgyal po kram kr'is grong khyer wa ra
K10D0346_H0354:461b-21: n'a sir nga deng bcom ldan 'das de'i grong du
K10D0346_H0354:461b-22: 'gro'o zhes dril chen po bsgrags nas /
K10D0346_H0354:461b-23: de 'khor brgya stong du ma dang /
K10D0346_H0354:461b-25: thabs gcig tu bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas /
K10D0346_H0354:461b-26: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag btsal te /
K10D0346_H0354:461b-27: chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go /
K10D0346_H0354:461b-28: ji srid cig na rgyal po kri kr'i sta na las langs te /
K10D0346_H0354:461b-29: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der thal mo sbyar ba btud nas /
K10D0346_H0354:462a-3: 'dir bdag gung gcig la bdag gis rmi lam bcu khums pa /
K10D0346_H0354:462a-4: glang po che skar khung nas byung ba na de'i
K10D0346_H0354:462a-5: mjug ma thogs pa la sogs pa snga ma bzhin
K10D0346_H0354:462a-6: te / bcom ldan 'das kyi rmi lam de'i 'bras bu 'dir bdag la lung bstan du gsol /
K10D0346_H0354:462a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0346_H0354:462a-10: khyod kyi yul 'khor nyams par mi 'gyur la /
K10D0346_H0354:462a-11: srog gi bar chad du yang mi 'gyur gyi /
K10D0346_H0354:462a-13: gzhan du na ma 'ongs pa'i tshe skye dgu'i tshe
K10D0346_H0354:462a-14: lo brgya thub pa na sh'akya thub pa zhes bya
K10D0346_H0354:462a-15: ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ste
K10D0346_H0354:462a-16: / de'i phyi ma'i dus na nyan thos rnams lus ma bsdams pa /
K10D0346_H0354:462a-19: shes rab ma bsdams pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10D0346_H0354:462a-20: de rnams gnyen gyi tshogs spangs nas rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10D0346_H0354:462a-21: de rnams gtsug lag khang rnams su khyim gyi 'du shes 'jog pas chags par 'gyur te /
K10D0346_H0354:462a-22: glang po che skar khung nas byung ba na /
K10D0346_H0354:462a-23: de'i mjug ma thogs pa ni de'i snga ltas yin no //
K10D0346_H0354:462a-25: khyod kyis skom pa'i phyi nas khron pa snyegs pa
K10D0346_H0354:462a-26: rmi lam du mthong ba gang yin pa de ni
K10D0346_H0354:462a-27: de rnams gtsug lag khang gi nang na lhan cig
K10D0346_H0354:462b-0: gnas pa rnams la chos ston @462b par 'gyur yang
K10D0346_H0354:462b-1: / de rnams mnyan par 'dod par mi byed cing /
K10D0346_H0354:462b-3: de'i snga ltas ni 'di yin no //
K10D0346_H0354:462b-5: khyod kyis phye bre gang dang /
K10D0346_H0354:462b-6: mu tig bre gang tshong byed pa rmi lam du
K10D0346_H0354:462b-7: mthong bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni de
K10D0346_H0354:462b-8: nyid kyi nyan thos rnams te /
K10D0346_H0354:462b-9: gang bza' ba tsam gyi don du dbang po dang /
K10D0346_H0354:462b-11: byang chub kyi yan lag rin po che rnams yang dag par ston pa 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10D0346_H0354:462b-12: de'i snga ltas ni 'di yin no //
K10D0346_H0354:462b-15: shing mnyam por tshong byed par rmi lam du mthong ba gang yin pa de ni /
K10D0346_H0354:462b-16: de nyid kyi nyan thos rnams mu stegs kyi tshig gang yin pa rnams bzung nas /
K10D0346_H0354:462b-17: sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang snyoms par 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10D0346_H0354:462b-18: de'i snga ltas ni de yin no //
K10D0346_H0354:462b-20: khyod kyis kun dga' ra ba 'bras bu phun sum
K10D0346_H0354:462b-21: tshogs pa ma byin par len pa rnams kyis phrogs
K10D0346_H0354:462b-22: pa rmi lam du mthong ba gang yin pa de
K10D0346_H0354:462b-23: ni de nyid kyi nyan thos lus ma bsdams pa
K10D0346_H0354:462b-24: / sems ma bsdams pa; tshul khrims ma bsdams pa /
K10D0346_H0354:462b-25: shes rab ma bsdams pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10D0346_H0354:462b-26: de rnams dge 'dun rnams kyi me tog mchog dang /
K10D0346_H0354:462b-27: 'bras bu'i mchog rnams 'tsho ba'i phyir dge 'dun las
K10D0346_H0354:462b-28: bcad nas khyim pa rnams la ster bar 'gyur te
K10D0346_H0354:462b-29: / de'i snga ltas ni de yin no //
K10D0346_H0354:463a-0: khyod kyis glang po phru gus spos kyi glang po 'jigs par byed @463a *//
K10D0346_H0354:463a-1: pa rmi lam du mthong ba gang yin pa 'di
K10D0346_H0354:463a-2: ni de nyid kyi nyan thos rnams tshul khrims 'chal
K10D0346_H0354:463a-3: ba / sdig pa'i chos can de rnams gang dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa /
K10D0346_H0354:463a-4: dge ba'i chos can rnams zil gyis gnon par byed par 'gyur te /
K10D0346_H0354:463a-5: de'i snga ltas de yin no //
K10D0346_H0354:463a-7: khyod kyis spre'u mi gtsang bas gos pas gzhan la
K10D0346_H0354:463a-8: skud par rmi lam du mthong ba gang yin pa
K10D0346_H0354:463a-9: 'di ni de nyid kyi nyan thos rnams tshul khrims
K10D0346_H0354:463a-10: 'chal pa / sdig pa'i chos can rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10D0346_H0354:463a-11: de rnams kyis tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams la skur pa 'debs par 'gyur te /
K10D0346_H0354:463a-12: de'i snga ltas de yin no //
K10D0346_H0354:463a-14: khyod kyis spre'u rgyal por dbang por dbang bskur bar
K10D0346_H0354:463a-15: mthong ba gang yin pa de ni dus de'i tshe
K10D0346_H0354:463a-16: / rmongs pa rnams rgyal por dbang bskur bar 'gyur /
K10D0346_H0354:463a-19: khyod kyis ras gcig mi bco brgyad kyi drangs kyang
K10D0346_H0354:463a-20: ma ral par rmi lam du mthong ba gang yin
K10D0346_H0354:463a-21: pa de ni / de nyid kyi bstan pa sde pa bco brgyad du gyes par gyur kyang /
K10D0346_H0354:463a-22: rnam par grol ba'i ras ni ral bar bya ba mi nus par 'gyur te /
K10D0346_H0354:463a-25: khyod kyis skye bo'i tshogs chen po gcig tu 'dus nas /
K10D0346_H0354:463b-0: ma tshang 'dru bar rmi lam @463b du mthong ba
K10D0346_H0354:463b-1: gang yin pa de ni de nyid kyi bstan pa
K10D0346_H0354:463b-5: de ltar mi bzad pa rnams ma 'ongs pa'i dus
K10D0346_H0354:463b-6: na 'byung bar 'gyur ro; ;bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
K10D0346_H0354:463b-7: stsal pa / gang bcom ldan 'das yang dag par
K10D0346_H0354:463b-8: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la yang rgyal po
K10D0346_H0354:463b-9: stsal pa / kri kr'i dang / gser phreng can
K10D0346_H0354:463b-10: gyis thar ba'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa
K10D0346_H0354:463b-11: ba rnams bskyed pa yin no //
K10D0346_H0354:463b-14: de'i tshe na gser phreng can gang yin pa de
K10D0346_H0354:463b-15: ni ma ga dha bzang mo 'di nyid yin te
K10D0346_H0354:463b-16: / de'i tshe yang 'dis sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byas te /
K10D0346_H0354:463b-17: da ltar yang 'di 'ongs nas sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byas so //
K10D0346_H0354:463b-18: yang dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas /
K10D0346_H0354:463b-19: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa; btsun pa /
K10D0346_H0354:463b-20: gser phreng can gyis las ci zhig bgyis na gser gyi phreng ba btags par skyes /
K10D0346_H0354:463b-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0346_H0354:463b-23: 'di nyid kyis las byas pa yod de /
K10D0346_H0354:463b-24: sngon byung ba na zhing pa gzhan zhig gi chung mar gyur te /
K10D0346_H0354:463b-25: rang sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten la kha dog sna
K10D0346_H0354:463b-26: tshogs pa'i me tog rnams kyis phreng ba byas nas
K10D0346_H0354:463b-27: btags te / las de'i rnam par smin pas gser gyi phreng ba btags par skyes so //
K10D0346_H0354:463b-28: de bas na dge slong dag las gcig tu gnag
K10D0346_H0354:463b-29: pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu
K10D0346_H0354:464a-1: la; gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu dkar ba yin te /
K10D0346_H0354:464a-2: 'dres ma rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni 'dres ma'o //
K10D0346_H0354:464a-4: de bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams dang /
K10D0346_H0354:464a-6: las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la mngon par brtson par bya ste /
K10D0346_H0354:464a-7: dge slong dag khyed rnams kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o //
K10D0346_H0354:464a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10D0346_H0354:464a-9: dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K10D0346_H0354:464a-10: ma ga dha bzang mo'i rtogs pa brjod pa rdzogs so ////
K10D0346_H0354:464a-11: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dharma shr'i bha dra dang /
K10D0346_H0354:464a-12: zhus chen gyi lo tstsha ba dge slong tshul khrims yon tan gyis bsgyur te /
K10D0346_H0354:464a-13: sgra sgyur gyi lo tstsha ba chen po dge slong
